rulesets.name: IMF Competitive v0.22
rulesets.description:
Opinionated balance by the dev
The original ruleset for this game.
Includes custom cards

rulesets.name: IMF Eternal v0.6
rulesets.description:
New WIP format by EternalHours
Has 3 candles and no custom cards (yet)
3 of each common in main deck
5 of each in side

rulesets.name: IMF Vanilla v0.4
rulesets.description:
Vanilla act 2 gameplay.
4 of each common in deck,
1 of each rare

jake:
Draugr and bots with a 'beast mode'
should now work properly!
Also cairns are now immune to sacrifice
instead of hammering.
